p: The COME showed moderate cytotoxic effect on THP-1-XBlue™-MD2-CD14 cells. The IC 50 value of the extract was calculated to be 6.2 ± 1.2 µg/mL (95% CI 4.8–10.6 µg/mL) ( Figure 2). On the basis of this result, the COME concentration of 2 µg/mL was used for further analysis considered as non-toxic.
